alert.note: Alert for Elkhead and Park Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 21 at 10:04AM MST until February 22 at 2:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 14 inches. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Elkhead and Park Mountains and Flat Tops. * WHEN...From late tonight through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel will become extremely hazardous due to near whiteout conditions in periods of heavy snow and blowing snow. Plan on icy and snowpacked roadways and significant drifting snow. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
